content: Great game, above my expectations! I have been suggested to try this game and while normally I don't play on mobile, I am enjoying to play the game. I love fantasy and strategic games, especially if turn-based. This game has more meaningful choices you can image. While the battle and exploration system are quite simple to learn and use, they still offer a good variety of options.

I love playing this game! It's easy to learn and super fun to play. The variety of enemies, mini games and prizes you can get are really cool. I'm not much of a mobile game type person, but this game I really love!
replyContent: Thank you so much for your review Jesse! Really happy that you like our game!

content: As a non gamer, I'm glad I got introduced to this game as my first download. I just lost two hours of my life and I don't regret it. I highly recommend others to download this game - it's fun and super addictive!!
replyContent: Thank you so much for your review! Very very happy you enjoy our game! Big hugs!

content: I love the game smooth and fun to play!...as fan of fantasy and strategy games this is a perfect app. I appreciate that you can play offline because I normally play on my way to work! For sure I'll recommend the game is a nice introduction to the world of fantasy!‚ù§Ô∏è Keep the good job!üëç
replyContent: We are truly happy that you enjoyed our game. Thank you so much for your review!

content: Easy to learn, fun and rewarding for casual gamers like me. I like the mini games and the variety of enemies, prizes and cool spells. Very promising release and looking forward to the next update!
replyContent: Thank you so much for the great review!

content: Great game! The gameplay is fun and unique, kind of like a rogue like mixed with minesweeper. You can play whilst offline (with no internet connection) and there are no in app purchases or ads etc, which is a refreshing change.
replyContent: Thank you very much! Glad you like it! :)

content: I like the game, full of variety of quests and mini-games and always good to see something new and different on the mobile game market. Happy to see more development of it! Good job
replyContent: Thanks so much for the awesome review. Please tell your friends about the game and what they are missing out on :)

content: Simple but full of depth! The game is easy to play, fun and you can quickly get a good feel of the RPG genre without having to grind a lot.
replyContent: Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!
